Package nl.han.ica.oopg.tile

Class TileMap

java.lang.Object
nl.han.ica.oopg.tile.TileMap
public class TileMap
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains the map of Tiles which will be drawn within the game.

    Create a new TileMap.

    Create a new TileMap.

  • Constructor Details

    • TileMap

      public TileMap​(int tileSize, TileType[] tileTypes, int[][] indexMap)
      Create a new TileMap.
      Parameters:
      tileSize - The size the tiles will be.
      tileTypes - The Array with factory's which will be creating the different types of tiles.
      indexMap - The Map consisting of tileType indexes which will be used to create and draw the Map.

    • TileMap

      public TileMap​(int tileSize)
      Create a new TileMap.
      Parameters:
      tileSize - The size the tiles will be.

  • Method Details

    • getTileSize

      public int getTileSize()
      Gets the tile size of the tiles inside the TileMap.
      Returns:
      The size of the tiles in the Map.

    • setTileSize

      public void setTileSize​(int tileSize)
      Resize the tiles currently used in the map and sets the tileSize for new tile.
      Parameters:
      tileSize - The size the tiles will be.

    • getMapWidth

      public int getMapWidth()
      Gets the map width.
      Returns:
      The width in pixels of the first row of tiles in the map.

    • getMapHeight

      public int getMapHeight()
      Gets the map height.
      Returns:
      the Height in pixels of the first column of tiles in the Map

    • setTileMap

      public void setTileMap​(int[][] indexMap)
      Sets the indexMap used to create the tiles.
      Parameters:
      indexMap - The two dimensional int array which contains the indexes of the tileTypes.

    • getTileMap

      public int[][] getTileMap()
      Gets the TileMap.
      Returns:
      The two dimensional int array which contains the indexes of the tileTypes.

    • draw

      public void draw​(processing.core.PGraphics pGraphics)
      The method the view calls to draw the tiles of the TileMap.
      Parameters:
      pGraphics - The canvas on which the tiles will be drawn.

    • setTile

      public void setTile​(int x, int y, int tileType)
      Sets a tile on a specific position.
      Parameters:
      x - The location index of the tile on the x axis.
      y - The location index of the tile on the y axis.
      tileType - The index of the tileType which the tile must become.

    • getTileOnPosition

      public Tile getTileOnPosition​(int x, int y)
      Gets a tile from a given position.
      Parameters:
      x - The location in pixels of the tile on the x axis.
      y - The location in pixels of the tile on the y axis.
      Returns:
      The instance of the tile on the given position

    • getTileOnIndex

      public Tile getTileOnIndex​(int x, int y)
      Gets the tile index from a given position.
      Parameters:
      x - The location index of the tile on the x axis.
      y - The location index of the tile on the y axis.
      Returns:
      The instance of the tile on the given position

    • setTileTypes

      public void setTileTypes​(TileType[] tileTypes)
      Sets the TileTypes of the TileMap and adjusts the current map to the new Types
      Parameters:
      tileTypes - The Array which contains the tileTypes of the tileMap

    • getTileTypes

      public TileType[] getTileTypes()
      Gets the TileTypes inside the TileMap.
      Returns:
      The Array which contains the tileTypes of the tileMap

    • findTileTypeIndex

      public int findTileTypeIndex​(Tile tile)
      Gets the index from the TileMap of the given tile.
      Parameters:
      tile - The instance of tile of which the programmer wants the tileType.
      Returns:
      The index of the tileType of the given tile.

    • getTileIndex

      public processing.core.PVector getTileIndex​(Tile tile)
      Gets the tile index from the TileMap;
      Parameters:
      tile - The instance of tile of which the programmer wants the Location.
      Returns:
      An PVector which contains the indexes of the tile on the x and y axis of the tileMap.
      Throws:
      TileNotFoundException - Is being thrown when the given tile is not present in the current tileMap.

    • getTilePixelLocation

      public processing.core.PVector getTilePixelLocation​(Tile tile)
      Gets the x and y location of the tile.
      Parameters:
      tile - The instance of tile of which the programmer wants the Location.
      Returns:
      An PVector which contains the location of the tile in Pixels.
      Throws:
      TileNotFoundException - Is being thrown when the given tile is not present in the current tileMap.
